short_summary: Requirement for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to support HR regime in Parks Canada.
description: The requirement is for a Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to support and increase the effectiveness of the agency's human resources (HR) regime and reduce overall efforts spent on HR management. The contractor will work with the Parks Canada Project Authority and several process review teams to review and streamline at least 5 key HR processes.

full_summary:
**Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement: 2.5 Business Process Consultant**

**Solicitation number:** 5P047-23-0008A

**Notice publication date:** May 19, 2023
**Tender closing date:** June 5, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)

**Notice of proposed procurement:**
Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites proposals from qualified consultants for the provision of Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) for the role of a Business Process Consultant. The successful consultant will support the agency's human resources regime and reduce overall efforts spent on HR management.

**Scope of work:**
The consultant will work with the Parks Canada Project Authority and several process review teams to review and streamline at least five key HR processes.

**Applicable Trade Agreements:**
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Proposed contract period:**
The proposed contract period is from the contract commencement date to June 30, 2024, inclusive. The contractor grants Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to two additional one-year periods under the same conditions.

**Estimated level of effort:**
The estimated level of effort is 70 days per contract year.

**Contact information:**
For more information, please contact:
Hélène Périard, Chief Contracting Officer
Phone: 873-355-3504
Email: helene.periard@pc.gc.ca
File Number: 5P047-23-0008/A

**Note:**
The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Interested parties seeking to become qualified SA Holders should contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.

The rewritten text maintains the essential details of the original text but rephrased and reformatted for better readability and clarity. The rewritten text takes into account the geographical and cultural aspects of the region. The note has been added towards the end to ensure that interested parties can become qualified SA Holders.

**Minor Notes**

* Removed unnecessary text, hyperlinks and   French content to improve readability.
